en: Theater Commands of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的一级军事组织，是深化国防和军队改革后的主要作战指挥机构，分为东、南、西、北、中五个战区。
description.en: A first-level military organization of the People's Liberation Army, serving as the main operational command structure after the deepening of national defense and military reform, divided into five theater commands: Eastern, Southern, Western, Northern, and Central.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的主要武装力量。
description.en: The principal military force of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军东部战区

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军东部战区
en: Eastern Theater Command of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的五个战区之一，主要负责东部沿海方向的军事行动。
description.en: One of the five theater commands of the PLA, primarily responsible for military operations in the eastern coastal direction.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军南部战区

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军南部战区
en: Southern Theater Command of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的五个战区之一，主要负责南部沿海及南海方向的军事行动。
description.en: One of the five theater commands of the PLA, primarily responsible for military operations in the southern coastal and South China Sea directions.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军西部战区

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军西部战区
en: Western Theater Command of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的五个战区之一，主要负责西部方向的军事行动。
description.en: One of the five theater commands of the PLA, primarily responsible for military operations in the western direction.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军北部战区

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军北部战区
en: Northern Theater Command of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的五个战区之一，主要负责北部方向的军事行动。
description.en: One of the five theater commands of the PLA, primarily responsible for military operations in the northern direction.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军中部战区

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中部战区
en: Central Theater Command of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的五个战区之一，主要负责保卫首都及作为总预备队。
description.en: One of the five theater commands of the PLA, primarily responsible for defending the capital and serving as the general reserve force.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军在2016年战区改革前的最高级别军事组织，共分为七个。
description.en: The highest level of military organization of the PLA before the 2016 theater command reform, divided into seven regions.

en: Deepening national defense and military reform

description.zh-cn: 由习近平领导的旨在重塑中国人民解放军组织架构和指挥体系的全面军事改革。
description.en: A comprehensive military reform led by Xi Jinping aimed at reshaping the organizational structure and command system of the PLA.

nodes.id: 军委管总、战区主战、军种主建

zh-cn: 军委管总、战区主战、军种主建

description.zh-cn: 深化国防和军队改革中确立的军队领导指挥体制改革的主轴思想。意为中央军委负责全面统筹，战区专注于作战指挥，各军种致力于部队建设管理。
description.en: The core guiding principle for the reform of the military leadership and command system established during the deepening of national defense and military reform. It means the Central Military Commission is responsible for overall management, theater commands focus on combat operations, and military services are dedicated to force development and management.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军战区成立大会

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军战区成立大会

description.zh-cn: 标志着中国人民解放军五大战区正式成立的会议，由时任中央军委主席习近平授旗并发布训令。
description.en: The conference that marked the official establishment of the five PLA theater commands, where then-CMC Chairman Xi Jinping presented flags and issued instructions.

description.zh-cn: 中央军委办公厅所在地，是中国军事指挥的核心场所之一。
description.en: Location of the General Office of the Central Military Commission, one of the core venues for China's military command.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席、中央军事委员会主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as General Secretary of the Communist Party of China Central Committee, President of the People's Republic of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家军事领导机关，统一领导全国武装力量。
description.en: The highest national military leading organ of the People's Republic of China, exercising unified command over the nation's armed forces.

nodes.id: 中央军委联合作战指挥中心

zh-cn: 中央军委联合作战指挥中心
en: Joint Operations Command Center of the Central Military Commission

description.zh-cn: 中央军委的战略指挥机关，负责指挥全军的联合作战。
description.en: The strategic command organ of the Central Military Commission, responsible for commanding the joint operations of the entire military.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军南京军区

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军南京军区

description.zh-cn: 原中国人民解放军七大军区之一，辖区主要包括江苏、浙江、安徽、福建、江西等地。2016年改革中被东部战区取代。
description.en: One of the former seven military regions of the PLA, with its jurisdiction mainly covering Jiangsu, Zhejiang, Anhui, Fujian, Jiangxi, etc. It was replaced by the Eastern Theater Command in the 2016 reform.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军广州军区

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军广州军区

description.zh-cn: 原中国人民解放军七大军区之一。2016年改革中其辖区大部分被划入南部战区，湖北省划入中部战区。
description.en: One of the former seven military regions of the PLA. In the 2016 reform, most of its jurisdiction was incorporated into the Southern Theater Command, while Hubei Province was assigned to the Central Theater Command.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军成都军区

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军成都军区

description.zh-cn: 原中国人民解放军七大军区之一。2016年改革中被西部战区取代。
description.en: One of the former seven military regions of the PLA. It was replaced by the Western Theater Command in the 2016 reform.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军兰州军区

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军兰州军区

description.zh-cn: 原中国人民解放军七大军区之一。2016年改革中被西部战区取代。
description.en: One of the former seven military regions of the PLA. It was replaced by the Western Theater Command in the 2016 reform.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军北京军区

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军北京军区

description.zh-cn: 原中国人民解放军七大军区之一。2016年改革中其辖区大部分被划入中部战区，内蒙古自治区划入北部战区。
description.en: One of the former seven military regions of the PLA. In the 2016 reform, most of its jurisdiction was incorporated into the Central Theater Command, while Inner Mongolia was assigned to the Northern Theater Command.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军济南军区

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军济南军区

description.zh-cn: 原中国人民解放军七大军区之一。2016年改革中被中部战区取代。
description.en: One of the former seven military regions of the PLA. It was replaced by the Central Theater Command in the 2016 reform.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军沈阳军区

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军沈阳军区

description.zh-cn: 原中国人民解放军七大军区之一。2016年改革中被北部战区取代。
description.en: One of the former seven military regions of the PLA. It was replaced by the Northern Theater Command in the 2016 reform.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军空军中将，现任东部战区代司令员。
description.en: Lieutenant General of the PLA Air Force, currently the acting commander of the Eastern Theater Command.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军上将，现任东部战区政治委员。
description.en: Admiral of the PLA Navy, currently the political commissar of the Eastern Theater Command.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军上将，现任南部战区司令员。
description.en: General of the PLA Ground Force, currently the commander of the Southern Theater Command.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军上将，现任南部战区政治委员。
description.en: General of the PLA Ground Force, currently the political commissar of the Southern Theater Command.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军上将，现任西部战区司令员。
description.en: General of the PLA Ground Force, currently the commander of the Western Theater Command.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军上将，现任西部战区政治委员。
description.en: General of the PLA Ground Force, currently the political commissar of the Western Theater Command.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军上将，现任北部战区司令员。
description.en: General of the PLA Ground Force, currently the commander of the Northern Theater Command.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军上将，现任北部战区政治委员。
description.en: General of the PLA Ground Force, currently the political commissar of the Northern Theater Command.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军空军上将，现任中部战区司令员。
description.en: General of the PLA Air Force, currently the commander of the Central Theater Command.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军上将，现任中部战区政治委员。
description.en: General of the PLA Ground Force, currently the political commissar of the Central Theater Command.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任东部战区首任司令员。
description.en: General of the PLA, served as the first commander of the Eastern Theater Command.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任东部战区首任政治委员。
description.en: General of the PLA, served as the first political commissar of the Eastern Theater Command.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任东部战区司令员。
description.en: General of the PLA, served as the commander of the Eastern Theater Command.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任东部战区政治委员。
description.en: General of the PLA, served as the political commissar of the Eastern Theater Command.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军上将，曾任东部战区司令员和中部战区司令员。
description.en: General of the PLA Ground Force, served as commander of the Eastern Theater Command and Central Theater Command.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任南部战区首任司令员。
description.en: General of the PLA, served as the first commander of the Southern Theater Command.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任南部战区首任政治委员。
description.en: General of the PLA, served as the first political commissar of the Southern Theater Command.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军上将，曾任南部战区司令员。
description.en: Admiral of the PLA Navy, served as the commander of the Southern Theater Command.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任南部战区政治委员。
description.en: General of the PLA, served as the political commissar of the Southern Theater Command.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军上将，曾任南部战区司令员。
description.en: General of the PLA Ground Force, served as the commander of the Southern Theater Command.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任西部战区首任司令员。
description.en: General of the PLA, served as the first commander of the Western Theater Command.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任西部战区首任政治委员。
description.en: General of the PLA, served as the first political commissar of the Western Theater Command.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任西部战区司令员。
description.en: General of the PLA, served as the commander of the Western Theater Command.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任西部战区政治委员。
description.en: General of the PLA, served as the political commissar of the Western Theater Command.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军上将，曾任西部战区司令员。
description.en: General of the PLA Ground Force, served as the commander of the Western Theater Command.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任北部战区首任司令员。
description.en: General of the PLA, served as the first commander of the Northern Theater Command.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任北部战区首任政治委员。
description.en: General of the PLA, served as the first political commissar of the Northern Theater Command.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任北部战区司令员。
description.en: General of the PLA, served as the commander of the Northern Theater Command.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军空军上将，曾任北部战区政治委员。
description.en: General of the PLA Air Force, served as the political commissar of the Northern Theater Command.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任中部战区首任司令员。
description.en: General of the PLA, served as the first commander of the Central Theater Command.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任中部战区首任政治委员。
description.en: General of the PLA, served as the first political commissar of the Central Theater Command.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军空军上将，曾任中部战区司令员。
description.en: General of the PLA Air Force, served as the commander of the Central Theater Command.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任中部战区政治委员。
description.en: General of the PLA, served as the political commissar of the Central Theater Command.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国首都。
description.en: Capital of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军战区

description.zh-cn: 深化国防和军队改革中，原有的七大军区被重组并改制为五大战区，以配合“军委管总、战区主战、军种主建”的主轴思想。
description.en: During the deepening of national defense and military reform, the original seven military regions were reorganized into five theater commands to align with the core principle of 'the CMC manages overall, theater commands focus on combat, and services are responsible for development'.

relationships.target: 大军区

description.zh-cn: 作为深化国防和军队改革的一部分，大军区体制于2016年2月1日被战区体制正式取代。
description.en: As part of the deepening of national defense and military reform, the military region system was officially replaced by the theater command system on February 1, 2016.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军战区成立大会
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军战区

description.zh-cn: 2016年2月1日，中国人民解放军战区成立大会在北京八一大楼召开，标志着五大战区正式成立。
description.en: On February 1, 2016, the Founding Conference of the PLA Theater Commands was held at the August 1st Building in Beijing, marking the official establishment of the five theater commands.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军战区

description.zh-cn: 在2016年2月1日的中国人民解放军战区成立大会上，时任中央军委主席习近平向五大战区授予军旗并发布训令。
description.en: At the Founding Conference of the PLA Theater Commands on February 1, 2016, then-CMC Chairman Xi Jinping presented flags to the five theater commands and issued instructions.

relationships.source: 军委管总、战区主战、军种主建
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军战区

description.zh-cn: “军委管总、战区主战、军种主建”是战区体制改革的主轴思想，明确了战区“主战”的核心职能。
description.en: 'The CMC manages overall, theater commands focus on combat, and services are responsible for development' is the core principle of the theater command reform, defining the primary combat-focused function of the theater commands.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军

description.zh-cn: 战区是中国人民解放军的一级军事组织。
description.en: The Theater Commands are a first-level military organization of the People's Liberation Army.

relationships.source: 中央军委联合作战指挥中心
relationships.target: 中央军事委员会

description.zh-cn: 中央军委联合作战指挥中心是中央军事委员会的战略指挥机关。
description.en: The Joint Operations Command Center of the CMC is a strategic command organ of the Central Military Commission.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军东部战区
relationships.target: 中央军委联合作战指挥中心

description.zh-cn: 各战区在中央军委联合作战指挥中心的战略全局统领下拥有具体战略和战役的指挥权。
description.en: Each theater command has command authority over specific strategies and campaigns under the overall strategic direction of the CMC Joint Operations Command Center.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军南部战区
relationships.target: 中央军委联合作战指挥中心

description.zh-cn: 各战区在中央军委联合作战指挥中心的战略全局统领下拥有具体战略和战役的指挥权。
description.en: Each theater command has command authority over specific strategies and campaigns under the overall strategic direction of the CMC Joint Operations Command Center.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军西部战区
relationships.target: 中央军委联合作战指挥中心

description.zh-cn: 各战区在中央军委联合作战指挥中心的战略全局统领下拥有具体战略和战役的指挥权。
description.en: Each theater command has command authority over specific strategies and campaigns under the overall strategic direction of the CMC Joint Operations Command Center.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军北部战区
relationships.target: 中央军委联合作战指挥中心

description.zh-cn: 各战区在中央军委联合作战指挥中心的战略全局统领下拥有具体战略和战役的指挥权。
description.en: Each theater command has command authority over specific strategies and campaigns under the overall strategic direction of the CMC Joint Operations Command Center.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军中部战区
relationships.target: 中央军委联合作战指挥中心

description.zh-cn: 各战区在中央军委联合作战指挥中心的战略全局统领下拥有具体战略和战役的指挥权。
description.en: Each theater command has command authority over specific strategies and campaigns under the overall strategic direction of the CMC Joint Operations Command Center.
